Room.Name: Level One Circular Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a great hallway that encircles the Castle Rutger.
Room.LongDescription: The castle is built in the form of concentric levels, each one atop the other. This level is the lowest and hence the largest. The hallway you are in completely encircles the base level where troops and other members of Rutger's fighting forces are garrisoned. On the upper floors you will members of the royal family and counselors to the Prince.
